mapper.insert: insert into FLOW_PAY (PAY_FLOW, PAY_AGENCY, AREA_CODE, PAY_COMM, PAY_COMM_RATE, PLAN_CODE, BATCH_NO, REWARD_GROUP, TRUNK_NO, BOX_NO, PACKAGE_NO, TICKET_NO, SECURITY_CODE, IDENTITY_CODE, PAY_AMOUNT, REWARD_LEVEL, LOTTERY_AMOUNT, PAY_TIME, PAYER_ADMIN, PAYER_NAME) values (#{payFlow,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payAgency,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payComm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payCommRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{planCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rewardGroup,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trunkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{securityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rewardLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lotteryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payerAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update FLOW_PAY
PAY_AGENCY = #{payAgency,jdbcType=CHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_COMM = #{payComm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_COMM_RATE = #{payCommRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLAN_CODE = #{planCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REWARD_GROUP = #{rewardGroup,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRUNK_NO = #{trunkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOX_NO = #{boxNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PACKAGE_NO = #{packageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TICKET_NO = #{ticketNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECURITY_CODE = #{securityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY_CODE = #{identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_AMOUNT = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REWARD_LEVEL = #{rewardLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOTTERY_AMOUNT = #{lotteryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_TIME = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAYER_ADMIN = #{payerAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYER_NAME = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PAY_FLOW = #{payFlow,jdbcType=CHAR}

update FLOW_PAY set PAY_AGENCY = #{payAgency,jdbcType=CHAR}, AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAY_COMM = #{payComm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_COMM_RATE = #{payCommRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PLAN_CODE = #{planCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REWARD_GROUP = #{rewardGroup,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRUNK_NO = #{trunkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOX_NO = #{boxNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PACKAGE_NO = #{packageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TICKET_NO = #{ticketNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECURITY_CODE = #{securityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTITY_CODE = #{identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_AMOUNT = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REWARD_LEVEL = #{rewardLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOTTERY_AMOUNT = #{lotteryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_TIME = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAYER_ADMIN = #{payerAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYER_NAME = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PAY_FLOW = #{payFlow,jdbcType=CHAR}
